university.description: Started my programming journey at Hutech University - one of Vietnam's leading universities in information technology. This was my first year getting familiar with the world of programming and technology.

learnings.title: What I Learned
items: Understanding the basic structure of computer programs
Getting familiar with variables, functions, loops, and conditions
Understanding pointers and memory management concepts

challenges.title: Challenges & Experiences
challenges.description: 2022 was a challenging starting year when I first encountered programming. From knowing nothing about code to being able to write simple programs, this was an important turning point in my learning journey.

oop.title: Object-Oriented Programming
oop.description: Mastering OOP concepts: classes, objects, inheritance, polymorphism, encapsulation.

database.title: Database Systems
database.description: Learning SQL, database design, normalization, and data management.

graphTheory.description: Implementing graph algorithms like DFS, BFS, Dijkstra, Kruskal.

operatingSystem.title: Operating System Practice
operatingSystem.description: Working with Linux, shell scripting, process management.

oopPractice.title: Object-Oriented Programming Practice
oopPractice.description: Building Java applications with OOP principles.

items: Achieved grade A in Graph Theory Practice
Achieved grade A in Object-Oriented Programming Practice
Mastered foundational knowledge of data structures and algorithms
Deep understanding of network programming and socket programming
